question: Which theory of <image 1> focuses on the labels acquired through the educational process?
description: The image depicts a globe resting on top of a large green book labeled "EDUCATION." Surrounding the globe and the book are stacks of other books with various subjects written on their spines. The subjects include Mathematics, Biology, Social Studies, Geography, Politics, History, Physiology, Computers, English, Sports, Physics, Design, Finance, Religion, and more. The background is dark, which makes the globe and the books stand out prominently.
